LinkItem.internal_link_text: Prepare an Oracle Linux 6.4+ Virtual Machine for Azure
Prepare an Oracle Linux 6.4+ Virtual Machine for Azure
Prepare an Oracle Linux 7.0+ Virtual Machine for Azure
Prepare an Oracle Linux 7.0+ Virtual Machine for Azure
Install the Hyper-V Role and Configure a Virtual Machine
Install the Hyper-V Role and Configure a Virtual Machine

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: DEVICE=eth0 ONBOOT=yes BOOTPROTO=dhcp TYPE=Ethernet USERCTL=no PEERDNS=yes IPV6INIT=no

# sudo mkdir -m 0700 /var/lib/waagent # sudo mv /lib/udev/rules.d/75-persistent-net-generator.rules /var/lib/waagent/ 2>/dev/null # sudo mv /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules /var/lib/waagent/ 2>/dev/null
ResourceDisk.Format=y ResourceDisk.Filesystem=ext4 ResourceDisk.MountPoint=/mnt/resource ResourceDisk.EnableSwap=y ResourceDisk.SwapSizeMB=2048 ## NOTE: set this to whatever you need it to be.
DEVICE=eth0 ONBOOT=yes BOOTPROTO=dhcp TYPE=Ethernet USERCTL=no PEERDNS=yes IPV6INIT=no

# sudo mkdir -m 0700 /var/lib/waagent # sudo mv /lib/udev/rules.d/75-persistent-net-generator.rules /var/lib/waagent/ 2>/dev/null # sudo mv /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules /var/lib/waagent/ 2>/dev/null
# sudo yum clean all # sudo yum -y update
ResourceDisk.Format=y ResourceDisk.Filesystem=ext4 ResourceDisk.MountPoint=/mnt/resource ResourceDisk.EnableSwap=y ResourceDisk.SwapSizeMB=2048 ## NOTE: set this to whatever you need it to be.
